userId.description: App user id / Supabase auth id

deviceId.description: Target device id. Required for scope=single or scope=others

scope.description: Revoke a specific device, all except the caller, or all devices
scope.title: Scope

revoked.description: Number of device records marked revoked
revoked.title: Revoked

tokensRevoked.description: Number of refresh tokens invalidated via auth admin
tokensRevoked.title: Tokensrevoked

ip.description: Client-reported IP if available; server IP is authoritative

login.description: Whether this event is a login (updates last_login_at)
login.title: Login

refreshToken.description: Supabase refresh token to allow remote sign-out
refreshToken.title: Refreshtoken

email.description: Email to share the project with
email.title: Email

parameters.description: Email to fetch a specific user
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Supabase auth/user id to fetch a specific user
parameters.name: userId

post.description:
Receive job results from the orchestrator worker and upsert the agent message.
Requires a matching x-orchestrator-secret header.

schema.title: Response Recent Activity Projects Activity Get
